Activity: Log in, check emails, and review the week’s progress on the onboarding checklist and compliance.
Make final adjustments to the onboarding checklist based on discussions throughout the week.
Send out the finalized onboarding checklist to all team members for documentation.
Prepare a report summarizing the week's accomplishments regarding the onboarding checklist and compliance processes.
Email the report to the COO @coo-1, Legal Counsel @legal-1, and Compliance Officer @comp-1.
Participate in a weekly wrap-up meeting to discuss the onboarding checklist's final approval and next steps.
